cardEffects.effectText: [When Attacking] When you attack an opponent's Digimon, this Digimon gets +1000 DP for the turn.
[Your Turn] While this Digimon has ＜Piercing＞, it gets +2000 DP.
[When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If your opponent has a Digimon with no digivolution cards, ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck).
[Your Turn] While your opponent has 2 or more Digimon with no digivolution cards in play, this Digimon gets +2000 DP.
[Your Turn] While you have 6 or more security cards, this Digimon gets +2000 DP.
[When Attacking] If you have 5 or more security cards, ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck).
[When Attacking] If you've digivolved this turn, this Digimon gets +1000 DP for the turn.
[Your Turn] While your opponent has 2 or more suspended Digimon in play, this Digimon gets +2000 DP.
[On Play] Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 Tamer card among them to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of the deck in any order.
[On Play] Return 1 Digimon card with [Agumon] in its name from your recycle bin to your hand.
[Your Turn] When this Digimon is blocked, it gets +2000 DP.
[Your Turn] This Digimon gets +2000 DP.
＜Jamming＞ (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon).
[On Play] 1 of your Digimon gains ＜Security A. +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card) for the turn.
[Your Turn] While you have 3 or more memory, this Digimon gains ＜Security A. +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card).
[When Attacking] Gain 3 memory. At end of turn, lose 3 memory.
＜Piercing＞ (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon and survives the battle, it performs any security checks it normally would).
[Your Turn] When this Digimon is blocked, ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck).
[On Play] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with ＜Blocker＞.

[When Digivolving] This Digimon gains ＜Security A. +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card) for the turn. [Your Turn] This Digimon doesn't activate [Security] skills on Option cards it checks.
＜Piercing＞ (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon and survives the battle, it performs any security checks it normally would).
[On Play] ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck).
[On Deletion] Gain 1 memory.
＜Blocker＞ (At blocker timing, by suspending this Digimon, it becomes the attack target).
＜Jamming＞ (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon).

[Your Turn] This Digimon can't be blocked by your opponent's Digimon with no digivolution cards.
